name: Scroll Dungeon
description:
Run through a moving dungeon and avoid spooky monsters while collecting gems.

Pickaxes can be used to break walls if you find yourself in a sticky situation.

My very first game. It's tiny but I finished it so I'm happy

Made a clone of a clone that I saw on reddit for practice learning Godot. I decided to make it in a week and go for a gameboy aesthetic bc of the GB Jam that recently happened that I missed. 

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

K - Pickaxe (Hold to break a wall)
